name: Mettur Orgtanics
overview:
Ours is a Small Scale Industrial Unit set-up in the Govt.organised Sector engaged in the manufacture of a host of specialty chemicals used in the following sectors: Textile Processing - dyeing,bleaching and finishing industries Household cleaning products Mfg. Leather tanning and leather chemicals Mfg. Rubber band industries Spinning Mills - cotton and man-made fibres Acrylic yarn and fabric dyeing industries

We follow the latest green field technologies taking into consideration the environmental pollution norms etc. At the same time,we do not compromise on the quality of our products.

products.name: Textile Process Chemicals,Turkey Red Oil upto 93%,Multi-purpose Liquid Detergent,Cotton Spray Oil,Antistatic Agent,,Dye Retarding Agent etc.
